director.name: 维克多·博吉诺夫 Victor Bojinov

introduction: The screenplay, penned by Delyana Maneva, starts by exploring the serene lifestyle of a group of young people of various nationalities living in a commune in the village of Chamla in the Rhodope Mountains. One day, a teenager, Danny (Alexander Kenderov), shows up in the village, and the group adopts him. Soon after, a man comes to Chamla claiming that Danny has escaped from a nearby rehabilitation centre for underage drug addicts… What Danny does next will set in motion a conflict between the commune and the centre.
